Title: VCR Maintenance and Educational Publishing
Plot: Jeff, Shirley and Hickey's discovery of a hidden stash of textbooks causes power shifts within the group; Abed and Annie play a VCR game to decide who gets to choose their new roommate.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Jonathan Banks, Brie Larson, Paul Williams, Vince Gilligan, Dominik Musiol, Spencer Crittenden, Gina Gershon
